    About Psychic Readings

    Our web site offers many ways to make choosing from among our authentic, gifted Advisors easy, and fun. Review Types of Psychic Readings and Types of Psychics for valuable information on the most important psychic specialties and types of readings. You may also find it helpful to read about ways to get a psychic reading, so you can pick the communication channel (eg telephone, online) that's most comfortable for you.

How to Rate Your Readings

Give a star rating and add a short written review after each reading to post on our website. This enables members to help each other connect with new Advisors and enjoy the best possible psychic experience.

5 stars Excellent
I will definitely choose this advisor in the future.
4 stars Very Good
I would be very likely to choose this advisor in the future.
3 stars Good
I would be likely to choose this advisor in the future.
2 stars Adequate
I would be somewhat likely to choose this advisor in the future.
1 star Unsatisfactory
I would be unlikely to choose this advisor in the future.

Tips for Writing Great Reviews

We do post negative reviews. However, we reserve the right to reject postings if they contain unsuitable material. Do not include any personal information in your review, including people's names, addresses, phone numbers, personal details, or mention of any other advisor.

Example of an Unacceptable Review:

Last week I talked to Destiny and she told me my boyfriend Bob was cheating on me with my best friend Sally. But Star told me he was in New York from November 5 to 20, so he couldn’t have been with Sally. I hope Star is right.

Example of an Acceptable Review:

Star picked up on my situation right away. I hope she’s right about my boyfriend being faithful, because a different psychic told me he was cheating. Star knew things about him that no one could possibly know, so she was able to put my mind at ease.

Only readings that lasted 3 minutes or longer are eligible for review. You have up to 3 months to rate and review your reading.

What can I even say about Zaphod Beeblebrox... She is quite amazing. I have to say, and I'm sure she picks up that every time I call I'm skeptical. As much as I beliieve, I also don't believe. But this man has told me some crazy things that have come to fruition!! My situation is quite interesting, and I can't imagine very easy for anyone to read. But, Zaphod Beeblebroxe somehow does it. I have to say the very last prediction she made to me I actually shook my head and thought no way that's never gonna happen. Well, I spoke to him on a Monday and it happened that Friday. I was so shocked that i actually felt ill for about 2 days!! Anyway, Zaphod Beeblebrox you're awesome and I LOVE speaking to you and hearing what you have to say... Have an awesome day!!! P.s.... 01/13/2015 with The Amazing Gusto x1895 3½ stars Chat Reading

This is my third reading with Amazing Gusto and it will not be my last. She always remembers me and our prior readings. I was feeling empty and a little out of sorts, Really did not know which way to turn. Within 10 minutes of our last read she had put my heart and mind at ease. Amazing Gusto is understanding and very compassionate. She truly does see things and tells you exactly as she sees everything good or bad. One of his predictions came to pass and she really hit the nail on the head even with the two delays. Once again she told me things that I would only know. She has such a gentle and soothing voice and really takes an interest in your situation. Amazing Gusto is truly happy when your predictions come to fruition. I am praying that the next few major predictions happen exactly as she does see it. I ended our call with a lighter heart and a better frame of mind. I will update and will most definitely be calling Mazie again. The only person that I was ever able to talk to about everything was my mom who has passed away. I have found the next best to my mom. Amazing Gusto, you are a treasured angel and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I will never speak to anyone but him, feels like I have known him all my life. God Bless You!!!!!
